mapper.select: select member_no , member_id , member_pwd , member_name , member_phone , member_create_dt , member_link , report_count , member_status , member_profile , partner_join , partner_name , partner_intro from member where member_status IN ('Y', 'A') and member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set status = 'N' , member_create_dt = sysdate where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{memberId}
